mapper.insert: INSERT INTO VOTE_INFO (vote_idx, sche_idx, vote_score, created_at, id, vote_result, tr_idx) VALUES (vote_info_seq.nextval, #{sche_idx}, #{vote_score}, #{create_at}, #{id}, #{vote_result}, #{tr_idx})
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM VOTE_INFO WHERE ID = #{ID} AND (SCHE_IDX = #{SCHE_IDX} and tr_idx = #{tr_idx})
